name: Circuit Break
description:
You are nearing the end of your long journey searching for an escape from your digital prison, but you're not done yet.

[WASD] - Move

[Mouse] - Look

[Left Mouse Button] - Shoot

[Space] - Jump

Controllers are supported outside of menus.

Gameplay Footage: https://streamable.com/lun41y

Sourced Assets:

  • TS_Fireworks Asset Pack from Unreal Marketplace
  • Extron DMP 128 - subboard 20-947-01LF (© Raimond Spekking / CC BY-SA 4.0)
  • These textures from textures.com:
    • https://www.textures.com/download/pbr0311/134394?q=circuit
    • https://www.textures.com/download/pbr0149/133184?q=plastic
    • https://www.textures.com/download/pbr0014/133050?q=copper
  • Explosion particles and sound from Unreal Starter Content
  • Mixamo for player character animations

Everything else  (models, music, etc.) was made by me. I am a single developer.
